name: Monster Chef (itch)
description:
This game was created for the Wowie Jam! Feb 1st 2018.

Game topic: EVERYTHING INTERACTS WITH EVERYTHING

In Monster Chef, mix different ingredients to discover new recipes and complete food orders as fast a possible to maximize your score. Take too long and orders start to disappear then it's game over. 

Click the crates to add ingredients to the pot.

Clicking the pot gives you a fresh pot to cook in.

*HINT*  2 Bread + 2 Cheese = Grilled Cheese Sandwich!
